data.message:
Project setup for RViz based on ignition rendering (#3)

* Configure ROS2 packages

* Add FrameManager to keep track of tf frames

* Custom drawer menu for loading visualization plugins

* Add plugin loading framework

* Setup Rviz application and load Scene3D plugin on launch

* Add qt integration to plugins

* Add tf visualization plugin
